attributes.title: cheeto puff strikes again
attributes.review: trump is a known racist, sexist, xenophobic, and homophobic person who didn’t even win a popular vote to get into office and has done nothing to improve our country. he whole-heartedly believes that the coronavirus will just “go away” and has sent this country into a downward spiral that we are in no way, shape, or form even CLOSE to getting out of. this app is a major propaganda piece that doesn’t deserve anyone’s support as all his actions and policies as president have been detrimental to this country. anyways.... biden 2020✌️

attributes.title: I can’t believe this app exists
attributes.review: I was really curious to see what this app could offer because i thought it was interesting for the president to have his own app.  I am in complete awe when i find myself being forced to look at this ra*ist (y’all can look at that whatever way you would like *c/p*) trying to promote his presidency. Anyways so this app should be deleted immediately, it is emotionally scarring and inappropriate for people who believe in human rights or anyone who has at least a lick of empathy. thank you ❤️

attributes.title: I think it’s curse
attributes.review: I was looking forward to downloading the app but it took a day to load, when I opened the app it kept crashing. I finally decided to delete some apps and try again, it still didn’t work. Then in the middle of the night I was woken by something. I didn’t know what it was so I went back to sleep. Sleep never came so I decided to open the app again. It worked! But the face I saw on it scared me so bad That now I need months of therapy. Please don’t make the same mistake as me.

attributes.title: Terrible luv 💋🙈
attributes.review: DO NOT i repeat DO NOT download this app it gives your device DISGUSTING viruses! i downloaded it, and my iphone 11 has been glitching so bad! my phone battery now lasts less than 30 minutes when it used to go up to 2 DAYS, it also took hours to download! Terrible quality. ALSO- when the app FINALLY loaded i opened it to see false information, and when I tried to report it my phone crashed!! I would rather download Talking Tom onto my phone. 100% do not recommend.😡😡🤬

attributes.title: I’m disgusted
attributes.review: I got the app because I wanted to see my daddy trump and his gorg son Barrón too ofcourse (save Barrón 2020) but I opened the app just to see an orange😤😤😤 so disrespectful!!! Also super disrespectful the way he wants to delete tik tok🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 stay in your lane next time trump😁😁😁Ugh anyways so I enter my phone number (123-you-thought) and when ever I got in you won’t believe what...just a bunch of boring stuff like his Twitter like what!!!! I will be deleting the app ASAP!!!! But anyways I hope Barrón trump is okay because he’s my new daddy🥰🥰🥰 he’s super sweet😛😛😛

attributes.title: This app causes brain Damge
attributes.review: I got this app to c what the hype was that these old evaporating boomers were giving it as soon as I opened it I see this fat carrot stick of a man greeting me with his demonic presence immediately I got bad vibes and I started to lose brain cells on trying to figure out y these boomers that in one touch will tumble over and break support this man with his birds nest hair I fainted and woke up in the hospital the drs say I might never get well soon I am writhing this from my hospital bed hope none of u go through the same trauma as me 💀

attributes.title: Worst app known to mankind! 😡
attributes.review:
When i downloaded the app it took me to a pic of trump and if i looked really closely in the background i could see a tribe of wild oranges dancing around a bonfire and throwing in pictures of George Washington... i was outraged and immediately started writing this review. But as i am writing this, buff oranges started chasing me around my house! They are stealing my cat and spitting orange juice on the floor! I am karate chopping them now! They are running and have left my cat but are moving on to the next house... beware the buff oranges 

-traumatized person 

🚫🍊

attributes.title: This app almost BURNED my house and HAND down
attributes.review: First things first, as any normal person would I was downloading the app when my software started GLITCHING out of control I had to reset my phone which didn’t help at all. As I was setting up the app my phone started over heating BAD which burned my hand which cause me to scream and drop my phone on the carpet immediately my whole entire LIVING ROOM was going down in flames it was lucky enough that I keep a fire extinguisher in my home. But this app is a HORRIBLE CHOICE FOR YOUR SOFTWARE

attributes.userName: why do i say my name?
attributes.title: Worst app 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.review: This app is so terrible. I tried to download it about a week ago and every time I think it downloaded into my phone I try to enter the app and it just kicks me out. And also, my dog wanted to download the app on her phone but it did the same thing. Today it finally let me in the app but for some odd reason the app exploded in my phone!!! 🔥🔥I don’t know how that was even possible. Then about a couple of days later my dogs app exploded as well!! 💥💥💥This app is absolutely dangerous!!!

attributes.title: How did Apple approve this app?
attributes.review: I had the WORST experience on this app. I had witnessed myself and many others be degraded for my race and sexuality. Apple why did you let this app continue while it is promoting fascism, a white homeland, racism, homophobia, ICE, the Blue Lives Matter movement, the All Lives Matter movement, and many more. I am truly disgusted how I have witnessed such ignorance after using this app. This app is spreading false information about the worldwide issues, and degrading to POC, Apple how could you be promoting this app’s message I am appalled.
